daf6fad9-93b6-46e6-b86b-5d3d25abe238.definition: The disclosure of any contractual instruments that is necessary to inform users' understanding of the entity's scope 2 greenhouse gas emissions.

46976663-0a2d-4ccb-9555-6cc47b7c925d.prefLabel: Approach Used To Measure GHG Emissions Explanatory
46976663-0a2d-4ccb-9555-6cc47b7c925d.definition: The disclosure of the approach the entity uses to measure its greenhouse gas emissions, including: (1) the measurement approach, inputs and assumptions the entity uses to measure its greenhouse gas emissions (including emission factors and the extent to which the Scope 3 emissions are measured using inputs from specific activities and the extent to which they are measured using inputs that are verified); (2) the reason why the entity has chosen the measurement approach, inputs and assumptions it uses to measure its greenhouse gas emissions; and (3) any changes the entity made to the measurement approach, inputs and assumptions during the reporting period and the reasons for those changes.

0ebaf152-0fe8-40ff-acda-f62175ee7b90.prefLabel: Assessment Of Resilience Of Strategy And Business Model In Relation To Identified Risks Explanatory
0ebaf152-0fe8-40ff-acda-f62175ee7b90.definition: The disclosure of the quantitative or qualitative assessment of the resilience of the entity's strategy and business model in relation to its sustainability-related risks (including climate-related risks), including information about how the assessment was carried out and its time horizon. When providing quantitative information, an entity may disclose a single amount or a range.

519ac842-af36-4c6a-ab3d-dddd375b3392.prefLabel: Circumstances That Led To Existence Of Prior Period Errors That Are Impracticable To Correct And Description Of How And From When Errors Have Been Corrected Explanatory

60a9f63c-4311-4352-ad27-010591537009.definition: The disclosure of the effects of significant events and changes in circumstances (relevant to its greenhouse gas emissions) that occur between the reporting dates of the entities in its value chain and the date of the entity's general purpose financial reports.

0a77364f-41a3-465b-9c33-9264f3018051.prefLabel: Approach To Setting And Reviewing Target And Monitoring Progress Explanatory
0a77364f-41a3-465b-9c33-9264f3018051.definition: The disclosure of how the entity's approach to setting and reviewing the target, and how it monitors progress against the target.

12090af5-7042-4961-b900-8fab514cd160.definition: The disclosure of the entity's assessment of its climate resilience as at the reporting date. Climate resilience is the capacity of an entity to adjust to climate-related changes, developments or uncertainties. Climate resilience involves the capacity to manage climate-related risks and benefit from climate-related opportunities, including the ability to respond and adapt to climate-relate transition risks and climate-related physical risks. An entity's climate resilience includes both its strategic resilience and its operational resilience to climate-related changes, developments or uncertainties.

9dad0794-faa5-495d-afce-6aa5b9a78bc3.definition: The disclosure of how the entity is resourcing, and plans to resource, the activities disclosed in relation to how the entity has responded to, or anticipates having to respond to, climate-related risks and opportunities in its strategy and decision-making.
path_label: Effects Of Climate Related Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decision Making Line Items
Effects Of Climate Related Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decision Making Abstract

81d04ea6-89f7-459f-92d9-9910fbaa7347.prefLabel: Description Of How Metric Is Defined Explanatory
81d04ea6-89f7-459f-92d9-9910fbaa7347.definition: The disclosure of how the sustainability-related metric is defined, including whether it is derived by adjusting a metric taken from a source other than IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Standards and, if so, which source and how the metric disclosed by the entity differs from the metric specified in that source.
path_label: Metrics Developed By Entity Line Items

5afff541-fd46-47a6-8f62-1d76c750e2ba.prefLabel: How Responsibilities For Risks And Opportunities Are Reflected In Terms Of Reference Mandates Role Descriptions And Other Related Policies Applicable To Responsible Bodys Or Individuals Explanatory
5afff541-fd46-47a6-8f62-1d76c750e2ba.definition: The disclosure of how the responsibilities for sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities) are reflected in the terms of reference, mandates, role descriptions and other related policies applicable to the responsible body(s) or individual(s). [Refer: Identity of governance body(s) or individual(s) responsible for oversight of risks and opportunities [text block]].
path_label: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract

aeb4da21-cef2-4d89-bd3c-343ac4617823.prefLabel: How Responsible Bodys Or Individuals Determines Appropriate Skills And Competencies Are Available Or Will Be Developed To Oversee Strategies To Respond To Risks And Opportunities Explanatory
aeb4da21-cef2-4d89-bd3c-343ac4617823.definition: The disclosure of how the responsible body(s) or individual(s) determines whether appropriate skills and competencies are available or will be developed to oversee strategies designed to respond to sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities). [Refer: Identity of governance body(s) or individual(s) responsible for oversight of risks and opportunities [text block]].
path_label: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract

aabe2bb2-6271-4dc9-963b-c3e68d1d2126.prefLabel: How Responsible Bodys Or Individuals Takes Into Account Risks And Opportunities When Overseeing Strategy Decisions On Major Transactions And Risk Management Processes And Related Policies Explanatory
aabe2bb2-6271-4dc9-963b-c3e68d1d2126.definition: The disclosure of how the responsible body(s) or individual(s) takes into account sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities) when overseeing the entity's strategy, its decisions on major transactions and its risk management processes and related policies, including whether the body(s) or individual(s) has considered trade-offs associated with those risks and opportunities. [Refer: Identity of governance body(s) or individual(s) responsible for oversight of risks and opportunities [text block]].
path_label: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract

30b811aa-b800-49aa-a073-181d0ecaff5d.prefLabel: How Risks And Opportunities Have Affected Financial Position Financial Performance And Cash Flows For Reporting Period Explanatory
30b811aa-b800-49aa-a073-181d0ecaff5d.definition: The disclosure of how sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities) have affected entity's financial position, financial performance and cash flows for the reporting period.
path_label: Current Financial Effects Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Current Financial Effects Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
Financial Position Financial Performance And Cash Flows Abstract

3458108a-4ee5-4e4d-a50b-4b688a01a075.prefLabel: Identity Of Governance Bodys Or Individuals Responsible For Oversight Of Risks And Opportunities Explanatory
3458108a-4ee5-4e4d-a50b-4b688a01a075.definition: The disclosure of identity of the governance body(s) (which can include a board, committee or equivalent body charged with governance) or individual(s) responsible for oversight of sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities).
path_label: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract

993a77cf-2d7c-4cf1-816a-e3b08a0a653b.prefLabel: Industrys Applied In Preparing Sustainabilityrelated Financial Disclosures Explanatory
993a77cf-2d7c-4cf1-816a-e3b08a0a653b.definition: The disclosure of the industry(s) specified in the IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Standards, the SASB Standards or other sources of guidance relating to a particular industry(s) that the entity has applied in preparing its sustainability-related financial disclosures, including in identifying applicable metrics.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract

e2fe9aca-bab8-4453-a34b-49fb705eb32f.prefLabel: Information About Judgements Apart From Those Involving Estimations Of Amounts Explanatory
e2fe9aca-bab8-4453-a34b-49fb705eb32f.definition: The disclosure of information to enable users of general purpose financial reports to understand the judgements, apart from those involving estimations of amounts, that the entity has made in the process of preparing its sustainability-related financial disclosures and that have the most significant effect on the information included in those disclosures.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract

a453d25a-2570-44be-b24e-ca55a7605724.prefLabel: Information About Significant Differences Between Data And Assumptions Used Preparing Sustainabilityrelated Financial Disclosures And Related Financial Statements Explanatory
a453d25a-2570-44be-b24e-ca55a7605724.definition: The disclosure of information about significant differences between the data and assumptions used preparing the entity's sustainability-related financial disclosures and the data and assumptions used in preparing the related financial statements.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract

6ec81d0e-dab7-4d01-bc42-aa6664f744e1.prefLabel: Information About Transactions Other Events And Conditions That Occur After End Of Reporting Period But Before Date On Which Sustainabilityrelated Financial Disclosures Are Authorised For Issue Explanatory
6ec81d0e-dab7-4d01-bc42-aa6664f744e1.definition: Disclosure of information about transactions, other events and conditions that occur after end of reporting period, but before date on which sustainability-related financial disclosures are authorised for issue.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract

519df9af-215b-4437-a68d-eaded4638c3f.prefLabel: Managements Role In Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor Manage And Oversee Risks And Opportunities Explanatory
519df9af-215b-4437-a68d-eaded4638c3f.definition: The disclosure of management's role in the governance processes, controls and procedures used to monitor, manage and oversee sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities), including information about: whether that role is delegated to a specific management-level position or management-level committee and how oversight is exercised over that position or committee; and whether management uses controls and procedures to support the oversight of sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities) and, if so, how these controls and procedures are integrated with other internal functions.
path_label: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract

b892a452-7d90-41fc-9c5c-706ff1f904b2.prefLabel: Method Used To Calculate Metric And Inputs To Calculation Including Limitations Of Method Used And Assumptions Made Explanatory
b892a452-7d90-41fc-9c5c-706ff1f904b2.definition: The disclosure of the method used to calculate the metric and the inputs to the calculation, including the limitations of the method used and the significant assumptions made.
path_label: Metrics Developed By Entity Line Items

94adcd8f-532d-4ab5-a3d6-cd22553b3f9a.prefLabel: Methodology Used To Calculate Financed Emissions Explanatory
94adcd8f-532d-4ab5-a3d6-cd22553b3f9a.definition: The disclosure of the methodology used to calculate the financed emissions, including the method of allocation the entity used to attribute its share of emissions in relation to the size of investments.

75ae0cf2-5379-4c62-8f7e-c26d7d52c690.prefLabel: Metric Used To Set Target And To Monitor Progress Explanatory
75ae0cf2-5379-4c62-8f7e-c26d7d52c690.definition: The disclosure of the sustainability-related metric(s) (including climate-related metrics) used to set the target and to monitor progress towards reaching the target.

dcfa2393-1d9f-44fe-a5fb-814b1eff642c.prefLabel: Metrics Developed By Entity Line Items
dcfa2393-1d9f-44fe-a5fb-814b1eff642c.definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.

2c4edc26-d795-4548-9898-a22c690b9fe0.definition: Schedule disclosing sustainability-related metrics developed by the entity.

fd983267-419d-4d87-854c-88dae3d9cb2d.definition: The disclosure of any milestones and interim targets for sustainability-related metrics (including climate-related metrics).

365647e3-d7b9-41e8-b0da-14ecbb1484da.definition: The disclosure of the objective of the climate-related target (for example, mitigation, adaptation or conformance with science-based initiatives).

76a73276-a832-4e91-a073-0af40dc4f012.prefLabel: Performance Against Target And Analysis Of Trends Or Changes In Performance Explanatory
76a73276-a832-4e91-a073-0af40dc4f012.definition: The disclosure of entity's performance against the target and an analysis of trends or changes in the entity's performance.

a1a0cb58-5830-4107-bb6d-4e369309b4f5.prefLabel: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Abstract

0c085b9b-e946-4595-908d-4f9d311f10aa.prefLabel: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Line Items
0c085b9b-e946-4595-908d-4f9d311f10aa.definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.
path_label: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Abstract

e1ca919d-2cb4-419c-ae85-9a2db04851b5.prefLabel: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Table
e1ca919d-2cb4-419c-ae85-9a2db04851b5.definition: Schedule disclosing the entity's planned use of carbon credits to offset greenhouse gas emissions to achieve any net greenhouse gas emissions target.
path_label: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Abstract

43a8be0d-2a97-46be-87b9-a20534adc5c2.prefLabel: Processes And Related Policies To Identify Assess Prioritise And Monitor Risks Explanatory
43a8be0d-2a97-46be-87b9-a20534adc5c2.definition: The disclosure of the processes and related policies the entity uses to identify, assess, prioritise and monitor sustainability-related risks (including climate-related risks).
path_label: Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract

63a7e0e6-268b-4e2e-aabd-e986a2e77775.prefLabel: Processes Used To Identify Assess Prioritise And Monitor Opportunities Explanatory
63a7e0e6-268b-4e2e-aabd-e986a2e77775.definition: The disclosure of the processes the entity uses to identify, assess, prioritise and monitor sustainability-related opportunities (including climate-related opportunities).
path_label: Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract

360e81b7-f7c4-47de-82dc-b0643cb89866.prefLabel: Progress Against Plans Disclosed In Previous Reporting Periods Explanatory
360e81b7-f7c4-47de-82dc-b0643cb89866.definition: The disclosure about the progress against plans the entity has disclosed in previous reporting periods, including quantitative and qualitative information.
path_label: Effects Of Climate Related Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decision Making Line Items
Effects Of Climate Related Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decision Making Abstract

159aaf50-8873-440f-99c6-9560bf031590.prefLabel: Reason For Using Reporting Period Longer Or Shorter Than12 Months Explanatory
159aaf50-8873-440f-99c6-9560bf031590.definition: The disclosure of the reason for using a longer or shorter reporting period when an entity changes the end of its reporting period and discloses sustainability-related financial disclosures for a period longer or shorter than 12 months.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract

72204c65-c473-453f-9971-e8b429b4b223.prefLabel: Reasons For Revising Comparative Amount Disclosed That Reflects New Information In Relation To Estimated Amount Disclosed In Preceding Period Explanatory
72204c65-c473-453f-9971-e8b429b4b223.definition: The disclosure of the reasons the entity has disclosed a revised comparative amount that reflects new information in relation to the estimated amount disclosed in the preceding period, and the new information provides evidence of circumstances that existed in that period.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract

90272a03-3331-4c25-91a2-f954c56ef55d.prefLabel: Redefinition Or Replacement Of Metrics Including Metrics Used To Set And Monitor Progress Towards Reaching Entitys Targets Abstract

8a719e97-53a2-4c25-9d08-0a718c5ad2f3.prefLabel: Redefinition Or Replacement Of Metrics Including Metrics Used To Set And Monitor Progress Towards Reaching Entitys Targets Line Items
8a719e97-53a2-4c25-9d08-0a718c5ad2f3.definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.
path_label: Redefinition Or Replacement Of Metrics Including Metrics Used To Set And Monitor Progress Towards Reaching Entitys Targets Abstract

306e2775-5417-4da5-ade1-5ead60555535.prefLabel: Redefinition Or Replacement Of Metrics Including Metrics Used To Set And Monitor Progress Towards Reaching Entitys Targets Table
306e2775-5417-4da5-ade1-5ead60555535.definition: Schedule disclosing the redefinition or replacement of metrics, including metrics used to set and monitor progress towards reaching entity's targets.
path_label: Redefinition Or Replacement Of Metrics Including Metrics Used To Set And Monitor Progress Towards Reaching Entitys Targets Abstract

b58ceaad-b413-461c-999a-5c842fe52b1d.definition: The disclosure of any revisions to the sustainability-related target (including climate-related targets) and an explanation for those revisions.

7cc5ca1d-e10a-4e1f-9f46-28d05457c927.prefLabel: Description Of Risk Or Opportunity Explanatory
7cc5ca1d-e10a-4e1f-9f46-28d05457c927.definition: The description of a sustainability-related risk and or opportunity (including climate-related risk or opportunity) that could reasonably be expected to affect the entity's prospects.
path_label: Climaterelated Risks Or Opportunities Line Items

61349a2f-3e9e-4222-b3b5-da685b7f09de.prefLabel: Risks And Opportunities With Significant Risk Of Material Adjustment Within Next Annual Reporting Period To Carrying Amounts Of Assets And Liabilities Explanatory
61349a2f-3e9e-4222-b3b5-da685b7f09de.definition: The disclosure of sustainability-related risks and opportunities (that have affected the entity's financial position, financial performance and cash flows for the reporting period), including climate-related risks and opportunities, for which there is a significant risk of a material adjustment within the next annual reporting period to the carrying amounts of assets and liabilities reported in the related financial statements.
path_label: Current Financial Effects Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Current Financial Effects Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
Financial Position Financial Performance And Cash Flows Abstract

6071e7c7-a00a-4407-a339-14345a968a6b.definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.

75015697-8074-4718-a073-c735e5c9c9eb.definition: Schedule disclosing information that enables users of general purpose financial reports to understand the sustainability-related risks and opportunities that could reasonably be expected to affect the entity's prospects.

43d7c750-9dd1-4629-a182-11a09b9d7fbc.prefLabel: Sources From Which Metric Was Drawn Explanatory
43d7c750-9dd1-4629-a182-11a09b9d7fbc.definition: The disclosure of the sources, other than IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Standards, from which the entity drew a metric.
path_label: Source Of Metrics Other Than IFRS Standards Line Items
Source Of Metrics Other Than IFRS Standards Abstract

e71f7d8e-1912-45bd-ae0d-c7791ac825d7.prefLabel: Sources Of Guidance Applied In Preparing Sustainabilityrelated Financial Disclosures Explanatory
e71f7d8e-1912-45bd-ae0d-c7791ac825d7.definition: The disclosure of the specific standards, pronouncements, industry practice and other sources of guidance that the entity has applied in preparing its sustainability-related financial disclosures, including, if applicable, identifying the disclosure topics in the SASB Standards.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract

4ca11614-8b95-4b58-b776-715885398300.prefLabel: Sources Of Measurement Uncertainty And Assumptions Approximations And Judgements Made In Measuring Amounts Subject To High Level Of Measurement Uncertainty Explanatory
4ca11614-8b95-4b58-b776-715885398300.definition: The disclosure, in relation to disclosed amounts that are subject to a high level of measurement uncertainty, of the sources of: measurement uncertainty-for example, the dependence of the amount on the outcome of a future event, on a measurement technique or on the availability and quality of data from the entity's value chain; and the assumptions, approximations and judgements the entity has made in measuring the amount.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract

22641613-d91c-4c95-ba29-7fbad1d2c70c.definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.

220356fb-c911-44bd-9137-50448a3fa1df.definition: Schedule disclosing information about the targets the entity has set to monitor progress towards achieving its strategic goals and the targets it is required to meet by regulation or legislation.

0a106eb6-72a4-453a-afd1-733c1f13109b.prefLabel: Time Horizons Over Which Effects Of Risk Or Opportunity Could Reasonably Be Expected To Occur Explanatory
0a106eb6-72a4-453a-afd1-733c1f13109b.definition: The disclosure of the time horizons - short, medium or long over which the effects of sustainability-related risk or opportunity (including climate-related risk or opportunity) could reasonably be expected to affect the entity's prospects.
path_label: Climaterelated Risks Or Opportunities Line Items

c9bda209-cb4f-476d-8a50-2dd2d1b868b4.prefLabel: Tradeoffs Between Risks And Opportunities Considered Explanatory
c9bda209-cb4f-476d-8a50-2dd2d1b868b4.definition: The disclosure of trade-offs between sustainability-related risks and opportunities that the entity considered (for example, in making a decision on the location of new operations, an entity might have considered the environmental impacts of those operations and the employment opportunities they would create in a community).
path_label: Effects Of Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decisionmaking Line Items
Effects Of Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decisionmaking Abstract

5d4f220e-b87e-4f3f-b97f-bb5903780eb6.definition: The disclosure of the type of carbon credit, including whether the underlying offset will be nature-based or based on technological carbon removals and whether the offset is achieved through carbon removal or emission avoidance.
path_label: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Explanatory
Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Line Items
Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Abstract

db2269f0-9755-4527-8b4c-c1ebf9a5b596.prefLabel: Type Of Material Information Not Disclosed Due To Prohibition Of Disclosure And Explanation Of Source Of Restriction Explanatory
db2269f0-9755-4527-8b4c-c1ebf9a5b596.definition: The disclosure of the type of material information not disclosed because law or regulation prohibits the entity from disclosing that information, and an explanation of the source of the restriction.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract

01f2729a-bf9a-4e7f-8f07-2050ada4f5f9.prefLabel: Verification Or Certification Schemes To Which Carbon Credit Will Be Subject Explanatory
01f2729a-bf9a-4e7f-8f07-2050ada4f5f9.definition: The disclosure of verification or certification scheme(s) to which carbon credit will be subject.
path_label: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Explanatory
Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Line Items
Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Abstract

40dab22f-e9a4-4964-bec7-ef9c7164ad0c.prefLabel: Whether And How Processes To Identify Assess Prioritise And Monitor Risks For Riskmanagement Purposes Changed Compared With Previous Reporting Period Explanatory
40dab22f-e9a4-4964-bec7-ef9c7164ad0c.definition: The disclosure of whether and how the entity has changed the processes it uses to identify, assess, prioritise and monitor sustainability-related risks (including climate-related risks) for risk-management purposes compared with the previous reporting period.
path_label: Processes And Related Policies To Identify Assess Prioritise And Monitor Risks Explanatory
Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract

99261da7-3f39-4fb1-84dc-5a044a49fb38.prefLabel: Whether And How Climaterelated Scenario Analysis Used To Inform Identification Of Climaterelated Opportunities Explanatory
99261da7-3f39-4fb1-84dc-5a044a49fb38.definition: The disclosure of whether and how the entity uses climate-related scenario analysis to inform its identification of climate-related opportunities.
path_label: Processes Used To Identify Assess Prioritise And Monitor Opportunities Explanatory
Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract

ee21b31a-5f98-4651-83c6-0a798f3f0117.prefLabel: Whether And How Scenario Analysis Used To Inform Identification Of Risks Explanatory
ee21b31a-5f98-4651-83c6-0a798f3f0117.definition: The disclosure of whether and how the entity uses scenario analysis to inform its identification of sustainability-related risks (including climate-related risks).
path_label: Processes And Related Policies To Identify Assess Prioritise And Monitor Risks Explanatory
Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract

e308aae7-d2a4-4664-9367-ca41bc0063b9.prefLabel: Whether And How Related Performance Metrics Are Included In Remuneration Policies Explanatory
e308aae7-d2a4-4664-9367-ca41bc0063b9.definition: The disclosure of whether and how sustainability-related performance metrics (including climate-related performance metrics), related to targets related to sustainabilty-related (including climate-related) risks and opportunities or the monitoring of progress towards those targets, are included in remuneration policies.

5cf739e9-d320-482d-8c3e-0127e2ac80c2.prefLabel: Whether Management Uses Controls And Procedures To Support Oversight Of Risks And Opportunities And How Those Are Integrated With Other Internal Functions Explanatory
5cf739e9-d320-482d-8c3e-0127e2ac80c2.definition: The disclosure of whether management uses controls and procedures to support the oversight of sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities) and, if so, how these controls are integrated with other internal functions.
path_label: Managements Role In Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor Manage And Oversee Risks And Opportunities Explanatory
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract

30c9bd82-742a-4896-a07a-788b36b63d1e.prefLabel: Whether Managements Role In Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor Manage And Oversee Risks And Opportunities Is Delegated To Specific Position Or Committee And How Oversight Is Exercised Explanatory
30c9bd82-742a-4896-a07a-788b36b63d1e.definition: The disclosure of whether management's role in the governance processes, controls and procedures used to monitor, manage and oversee sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities) is delegated to specific management-level position or management-level committee and how oversight is exercised over that position or committee.
path_label: Managements Role In Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor Manage And Oversee Risks And Opportunities Explanatory
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract

4035f157-5cf6-460e-99ec-8977f4c55867.prefLabel: Whether Metric Is Validated By Third Party And If So Which Third Party Explanatory
4035f157-5cf6-460e-99ec-8977f4c55867.definition: The disclosure of whether a sustainability-related metric is validated by a third party, and if so, which party.
path_label: Metrics Developed By Entity Line Items

61d6c661-323e-49dc-893d-c8d545489a71.definition: The amount of the drawn portion of a loan commitment.
path_label: Financed Emissions By Asset Class Line Items
Financed Emissions By Asset Class Abstract

03700fdc-d770-41b7-85fe-ef021a533e75.definition: Indicates whether Scope 1, Scope 2 or Scope 3 greenhouse gas emissions are covered by a target.

505fd333-a648-476a-afc4-6971043daa69.prefLabel: Entity Applies Carbon Price In Decisionmaking
505fd333-a648-476a-afc4-6971043daa69.definition: Indicates (true false) whether the entity applies carbon price in decision-making.
path_label: Explanation Of Whether And How Carbon Price Is Applied In Decisionmaking Explanatory

d5014e95-1ed8-47d2-93bc-f031ded01cb7.prefLabel: Entity Changed Processes To Identify Assess Prioritise And Monitor Risks Compared With Previous Reporting Period
d5014e95-1ed8-47d2-93bc-f031ded01cb7.definition: Indicates (true) that the entity has changed the processes it uses to identify, assess, prioritise and monitor sustainability-related risks compared with previous reporting period.

89f2f39a-8389-4354-a480-1656d09c3799.prefLabel: Entity Uses Climaterelated Scenario Analysis To Inform Identification Of Climaterelated Opportunities
89f2f39a-8389-4354-a480-1656d09c3799.definition: Indicates (true false) whether the entity uses climate-related scenario analysis to inform its identification of climate-related opportunities.

e2503ad2-de08-4365-98da-7967641f270d.prefLabel: Entity Uses Climaterelated Scenario Analysis To Inform Identification Of Climaterelated Risks
e2503ad2-de08-4365-98da-7967641f270d.definition: Indicates (true false) whether the entity uses climate-related scenario analysis to inform its identification of climate-related risks.
path_label: Whether And How Scenario Analysis Used To Inform Identification Of Risks Explanatory
Processes And Related Policies To Identify Assess Prioritise And Monitor Risks Explanatory

9887660d-c72a-40f4-82c0-1355bc893511.definition: Absolute gross location-based scope 2 greenhouse gas emissions generated during the reporting period. Indirect greenhouse gas emissions from the generation of purchased or acquired electricity, steam, heating or cooling consumed by the entity. Purchased and acquired electricity is defined as electricity that is purchased or otherwise brought into an entity's boundary. Scope 2 greenhouse gas emissions physically occur at the facility where electricity is generated.

726e6deb-8638-4187-a6b5-9da2b0549bb4.definition: Risks resulting from climate change that can be event-driven (acute physical risk) or from longer-term shifts in climatic patterns (chronic physical risk). Acute physical risks arise from weather-related events such as storms, floods, drought or heatwaves, which are increasing in severity and frequency. Chronic physical risks arise from longer-term shifts in climatic patterns including changes in precipitation and temperature which could lead to sea level rise, reduced water availability, biodiversity loss and changes in soil productivity. These risks could carry financial implications for an entity, such as costs resulting from direct damage to assets or indirect effects of supply-chain disruption. The entity's financial performance could also be affected by changes in water availability, sourcing and quality; and extreme temperature changes affecting the entity's premises, operations, supply chains, transportation needs and employee health and safety.

0d61aa90-8db7-4a46-a2db-112a685b8a70.definition: This member stands for the previously stated amount disclosed for a fact.

The entity's financial performance could also be affected by shifting consumer demands and the development and deployment of new technology.
